title: [Bug] Item Sets not usable in game
body: Item sets show in profile tab, but are not usable in game. Only have the "recommended" tab in the shop, with no dropdown or even dropdown arrow.

replies.body:
Hey Void,

I have heard similar reports about this.  In an effort to determine the root cause, can you please navigate to the following location of your LoL installation?

Local Disk --> Riot Games  --> League of Legends

Once here, please list (since attachments are currently not possible) any Folder found here (only folders, not files).  This should help narrow down the root cause.

Looking forward to your response!
I don't have a subfolder like that (installed with pandoless due to earlier issues). I have C:\Riot Games with Lol Launcher (normal and admin), air, Config, game, Logs and RADS inside.

Hmm...at the very least, it is not an issue I commonly see when Item Sets are not correctly appeared.  Because we are getting in the realm of needing attachments, and possibly a much further expanded back-and-forth interaction, could you please write a new ticket to Player Support explaining the issue?  Interacting in a ticket format will definitely get your issue resolved much faster!

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
There is already an extant ticket for this, but I have not received a response so I posted here. #8060270
Anyone there? Not seeing a response either here or in the support ticket.

Hello Void!  We strive to answer tickets ASAP, but we are sometimes have a back-log, causing a slightly longer wait time.  I checked your ticket, and one of our Tech specialists just answered your ticket!  He should be able to investigate this issue with you!  :)

Without looking at any files, his answer is "you will probably have to remake them inside of the client from scratch."

Also I know that item sets are local, but until there is a way to back them up could you guys maybe write a quickly script for backup and restore or port? They take a *significant* amount of time to make, so just writing everything down and redoing it all one at a time is a very large hassle (took me about 1.5 hours to get mine set up the first time, not looking forward to redoing that). It doesn't need a fancy GUI, just a quick script file that dumps to-from a text file on the desktop would be more than enough.
Does this happen with every champ you try this with?
Yes. For both champ specific and general sets.
